law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 207, effective July 15, 2010. -- Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 45, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2006 (1st Extra. Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 64, effective June 28, 2006. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 149, sec. 222, effective July 12, 2006; and ch. 211, sec. 78, effective July 12, 2006. -- Created 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 168, sec. 143, effective March 18, 2005.

metadata.lrc-note: (6/28/2006). 2006 (1st Extra Sess.) Ky. Acts ch. 2, sec. 73, provides that "unless a provision of this Act specifically applies to an earlier tax year, the provisions of this Act shall apply to taxable years beginning on or after January 1, 2007." (3/18/2005). 2005 Ky. Acts ch.168, sec. 165, provides that this section shall apply to tax years beginning on or after January 1, 2005.
